page.description: Print a value in the trace window, value is printed on its own line.

argument.name: expression
argument.description: A literal value or Xbasic expression to be evaluated, then displayed in the Trace window.

page.discussion: The TRACELN() function writes the value of an expression to the Trace window. This is a shortcut for the TRACE.WRITELN()method.

section.title: Example
section.description: The following example writes "blah" to the Trace window.
